article.title: Alion Science and Technology will Provide Technical Support to U.S. Army for Battle Command Training
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alion Science and Technology has received a $14 million contract, Modeling and Simulation Technical and Operational Reinforcement, to provide guidance and technical support to the U.S. Army III Corps Battle Command Training Branch at Fort Hood, Texas. Alion will develop a digital battle command system, digital exercise architectures and training plans.
